comment: Not everyone needs the same amount of water. Plus I hate that it forces you to use imperial system

title: Amber Tennant
comment: Amber Love

title: I would love it even more
comment: if we could create an account to save our progress forever.

title: Can't use all functions with Samsung S5
comment: I used to love this app, but I can't access the settings from my new phone :(

title: No metric tracking option
comment: Yes there is an entry in metrict you can't see your overall consumption in metric measurements.  I don't think in ounces, but in millilitres or litres.
Keeps stopping when changing settings. Uninstalled

title: Bummer. Looked cool.
comment: No matter what time I set for "wake time" it would have an error and close out. No thanks.
Offers no guide nor illustration of the compounded amounts of water one digests in one day.

title: Simple
comment: Simple and effective. I'm going with a different app solely for UI reasons but will keep an eye for the Holo update.

title: Great app!
comment: This app is very useful! It's very easy to use. I can set my personal daily goal and set how often I'd like to be reminded to drink. I like how you can preset "favorites" so it's easier to log. This is the best water app I've tried. The only problem I have is occasionally, the reminder will go off past my "sleep" time, but it's not anything major. It doesn't happen a lot.
Great app

title: Just what I was looking for!
comment: Love being able to add a customized amount of water and my own water intake goal. The widget was what I really wanted and it's 1x1 and easy to read. Let's just say this is the first app I have ever taken the time to review for... after using apps for 3 years. It's awesome!

title: Simple and easy
comment: Tried several and like this one the best. Lots of options, cn change goal and glass sizes,keeps a history, can go back and add on to a previous day if u forgot and has reminder with ur choice of tone, also no permissions!

title: Simple & Efficient
comment: Very easy to use + app doesn't require permissions to everything in my phone. Thank you for this app. Great work!

title: Like it very much! :D
comment: I like it! Pretty cool!

title: Good App.
comment: Good app but reminders don't work.

title: Quenched My Thirst
comment: This has everything I need to keep track of how much I'm drinking. First off I can chose my daily goal of how much I want to drink in a day. What would be nice to see is a way to calculate the amount of water need to reach you goal which at the moment you have to put in manually. I can customize the units to show Imperial (oz) or Metric (ml).  Very easy to use, I have a choice of setting the sizes of my favourite cup, bottle or glass, so I do not need to put the amounts in manually, if I do want to manually add an amount or a historical entry there is a button on the main screen which also allows me to do that if needed. A very good app, with features that tells me when my last drink was and how much I need to drink to hit my goal for that given day. The only down side is the history, which I don't really care about, it would enhance the app if you did a monthly/yearly total or in my case a way to delete all old entries as I can see no value once the week/month has been completed . No advertisements, easy to use right from the start.

title: Great tool for me!!
comment: Simple yet great. I have used this for two weeks and it is beneficial for my needs.

title: Worked when I firsr installed
comment: This was great the first 2 days. Haven't gotten any reminders since. Will be uninstalling

title: Standard
comment: Nothing flashy but simple to use. It should do conversions for u tho

title: I like it
comment: Does everything I need it to XD thank you dev teammm

title: Tracker
comment: Love it. However, still figuring it on the setting goal section

title: Helpful
comment: This app is helpful as it has a feature that reminds the user to drink water, it lets me set goals and how often I should be reminded.

title: Nice
comment: Just needs some graphs and stats.

title: Simple and easy to use.
comment: Just a great app for tracking your water intake without useless bell and whistles. I really like the widget so I can see my status at a glance. Well done!

title: Simple, effective, customizable, supported
comment: Simple effective design, customizable and generic enough for all different people drinking habits. Great possibility to add old entry, when someone forgots to log its drink. Very efficient and easy-to-use interface. Very good, that it is instantly updated and improved. Would buy a paid version, if existed to maintain this app and make it even better in the future.

title: Simple, effective, supported
comment: Does exactly what I need, developer is friendly and very responsive. Cheers!
Love it! So simple and no annoying reminders.

title: Looks good!
comment: Nice clean app, very simple yet has almost everything you need. I wish it had graphs/stats. 5 stars when these are available

title: Eh
comment: More complicated than it needs to be.

title: Simple interface packs a punch
comment: Love everything about this app particularly the preferred serving settings, and consumption history is a plus.  The clean and no-nonsense interface and clean design seals the deal.

title: At last!
comment: I'm really happy yo have found this app. Drinking more water is one of my 2 resolutions for 2012. And guess what? 3 months later, I'm still drinking water everyday and keep reaching my goal.

title: Great App
comment: This is a good app, I'm only uninstalling because I found one that I like better.

title: Simple and useful
comment: I appreciate choosing my unit, target and how it easily displays how much I need to drink to meet my target.  I don't like the other bells-n-whistles apps that don't actually help me meet my goals.  This is great.
I think this is the most thoughtfull app in the market! Thanks Devs.
No matter how many times i delete this app i just keep coming back to it. Pretty good app.

title: Error Message
comment: the first app, that give me a error message when downloading and installing, Error Duplicate provider authority, Please Fix

title: Good, could easily be great!
comment: I need the ability to continue to add water after midnight, I also need to edit past entries. I will give it 5 stars after these improvements.
Doesn't give reminder at the start of a new day. Otherwise a good lil app

title: good little app but
comment: good little app but sometimes the widget doesn't work and the ability to add in water the following day, rather than resetting automatically for the new day would be good.
Should stop reminding you to drink water when you hit your goal for the day.
Allow ability to edit your history & I would give 5 stars. I don't always record right away & sometimes need to input next day.
This app is amazing, my water intake is up 100%. Only reason I gave 4 stars is bc the widget is a little wonky. Sometimes it won't open when tapped.
Great app.even if youre having a busy day when you hear the little alarm reminder it makes you feel guilty if you don't at least take a sip of h2o
It's not always easy to remember to drink enough water. Since I started using this app my skin looks amazing.
The the interface and options were good. Unfortunately i couldn't get the reminders to work. Using droid x
I like it. Works well and keeps me on track to get enough fluids.
Helps me quite a bit after surgery with keeping up with fluid goals. Like the history tracking.
Changed to metric and entered my target but works it out as if I entered in foz. Poor
Needs way to disable reminder between certain hours for sleeping.
Great app....it really helps me to drink more. well done
Awesome app! However the widget doesn't always work. DROID 2
Great app!!! Big help. Mikey A from bellmore
Like the reminder as I am often dehydration but need it disabled during my sleep hours. Can you make this a reminder between certain hours?
I love this, it's easy to use and helps me stay healthy.
Perfect way to keep track of the necessary fluid post bariatric surgery. Very user friendly. Easy to make it your own.
A wonderful lil app! You don't realize how little h2o you consume. Thanks!!!!!!

Love this app. Makes drinking water fun.
I would love to have other units (litres), not just fl. If not possible, i'll uninstall.
Great app. Wish it had a graphical look at history but love the custom amounts I can set for quick add.
Day 2 & loving this app! (Even tho I'm already an avid water drinker.)
Im trying to drink more water and the widget really helps! Cool app!
